record.dc:title: 95MM31, 15MM31, Montgomery County, Kentucky. Camargo Mounds Site. Profiles 95-135 & 100L1-135 L1.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Kentucky Adena and Woodland Mound Sites
record.wpa:narrative: These profiles extend from the central area through the moatlike depression to the outer wall. The top line designates the depth of the plow. In places it was impossible to find this line. The bottom line is the bottom of the disturbed earth. In the bottom of the moatlike depression the depth of the disturbed soil was not well defined.
